name: Create a new issue in Redmine from a new submission in Google Forms
description:
This template regularly checks for new submissions in Google Forms and uses the retrieved information to create new issues in Redmine.

Note that your Google Form needs to store the responses into a Google Sheets spreadsheet as described [here.](https://support.google.com/docs/answer/139706?hl=en)

The information collected in your form needs to have the same structure as in [this sample spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Nfuw9F5fgVD8PZVXpmvDpfIybBeoXavqkd-irhBTxpU/edit?usp=sharing), otherwise the template will not work properly.
